detailsData.title: History of Winning
detailsData.content: McCann Dillon Jaffe & Lamb, LLC has a proven track record with $200 million in verdicts and settlements over the last 15 years, showcasing their commitment to achieving the best outcomes for their clients.

detailsData.title: Experienced Trial Lawyers
detailsData.content: The firm is composed of experienced trial lawyers who are not afraid to take powerful opponents to trial to recover the most favorable outcome possible for their clients.

detailsData.title: Wide Range of Practice Areas
detailsData.content: McCann Dillon Jaffe & Lamb, LLC offers legal representation across a broad spectrum of practice areas, ensuring clients receive specialized and comprehensive legal advice.

detailsData.title: Client-Centric Approach
detailsData.content: The firm prioritizes a responsive and individualized approach to each case, treating every client's legal matter with the utmost importance and dedication.

address: 1500 John F Kennedy Boulevard, Suite 1110, Philadelphia, PA 19102
subHeading: Pursuing Justice and Compensation for Injured Victims and Families in Pennsylvania, Delaware, and New Jersey
valueProp: Personal injuries are not always accidents. Negligence may be involved when someone has been injured or even killed. Many times, victims of personal injuries need assistance. Someone who suffers a slip and fall injury will build a different case with their lawyer than someone hurt in a car accident or injured as a result of medical malpractice. Those injured should consult with the Philadelphia personal injury lawyers at McCann Dillon Jaffe & Lamb, LLC as soon as possible to determine the most appropriate course of action.
